text: There are total 20 Member Parliament from Punjab. 13 in Lok Sabha and 7 in Rajya Sabha. Following is the List of Member of Parliament of India from Punjab. ==Lok Sabha== Keys: {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !S.
